Welcome!

Dr.Henderson's LHCb group focuses on the experimental search for signs of new physics beyond the Standard Model of elementary particle physics. We are part of the Experimental High energy physics reseatch at University of Cincinnati and general LHCb and we are active members of the LHCb Collaboration at CERN. We aim to establish a strong connections and work on Experimental elementary particle physics at the energy frontier, with the Large Hadron Collider at CERN. Check out the links above to learn more, or visit this page if you’re interested in joining our group.

PI: Conor Henderson
Associate Professor
College of Arts and Science, artsci
University of Cincinnati
